channel.title: DraconicScape 317 - HD Server! - Working freezes - Working on Dharok Noise!
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Hey guys, I'm gonna make my first server ever to be released. Here are some pics :):
Not much atm pictures though, will add more![/size]
[img]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/493/dracq.png[/img] [img]http://img690.imageshack.us/img690/3144/drac2.png[/img] [img]http://img547.imageshack.us/img547/6519/drac3.png[/img] [img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/3730/drac4.png[/img]
That's all :). Will add more soon!
Thanks, Arham

item.title: DraconicScape 317 - HD Server! - Working freezes - Working on Dharok Noise!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:5, topic:362494”]Looks like shit the first picture (home) is too crowded space things out a bit.
Honestly, if you played this server, how long would you play it for before quitting? A few days, maybe?
Delete the thing that says “~Safe~” and the PK icon, that makes it look terrible
Also when you’re in PVP change it so it doesn’t say “DEATH!!”, but change it so it does say like… “Level 1” or something in not red but in like yellow, then you’re server would be pretty cool. The HD thing is nice.[/quote]
Ill get to work with that, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: DraconicScape 317 - HD Server! - Working freezes - Working on Dharok Noise!
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Looks like shit the first picture (home) is too crowded space things out a bit.
Honestly, if you played this server, how long would you play it for before quitting? A few days, maybe?
Delete the thing that says “~Safe~” and the PK icon, that makes it look terrible
Also when you’re in PVP change it so it doesn’t say “DEATH!!”, but change it so it does say like… “Level 1” or something in not red but in like yellow, then you’re server would be pretty cool. The HD thing is nice.

Read full topic
